subject: EUROMILLONES AWARD
body:
EUROMILLONES AWARD
Madrid-Spain.
Ref No: ESM/WIN/008/05/10/MA
************************************

Attn: Winner,
We wish to congratulate you over your email success in our computer
balloting sweepstake held on 6th  May 2007.
This is a millennium scientific computer game in which email addresses
were used. It is a promotional program aimed at encouraging internet
users; therefore you do not need to buy ticket to enter for it. You
have been approved for the star prize of Eur 750, 000.00(Seven Hundred
And Fifty  Thousand Euro Only) in the Second Category.
This the first Promotional program for the year 2007. It is absolutely
the biggest bonanza in this year stakes.
To claim your winning prize you are to contact the appointed agent as
soon as possible for the immediate release of your winnings:
*********************************************************************
Mr. Mario Alberto (Claim Director)
AURA SEGUROS S.A
Calle Castellana 10,
28090 Madrid.
Tel: 0034-691-923-601
E-mail: contactaura@aim.com   or
         auraseguros@hotmail.com
*********************************************************************
The below informations are attached to your winning informations
(1) Batch No: EULO/2907/444/908/06
(2) Ticket No: 45407
(3) Lucky No: 3-18-40-40-76
(4) Serial No: 51622
(5) Ref No: ESM/WIN/008/05/10/MA

You must contact the appointed agent with your Full Names,Contact 
Telephone Numbers (Home, Office and Mobile Number and also Fax Number) 
including your winning informations stated above via email to process 
the immediate payment of your prize.
The Validity period of the winnings is for 30 working days hence you 
are expected to make your claims immediately.Any claim not made before 
this date will be CANCELLED.
Best Regards,
Mrs. Finela Transofa
(Lottery coordinator).
Madrid, 15th  May. 2007
EUROMILLONES AWARD
